user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) the additional information I requested for his job application, including his updated resume, professional references, and any recent certifications or awards. Remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Application Materials

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. To complete the review of your application, could you please send me the following items at your earliest convenience?

• Your updated resume  
• A list of professional references (with contact details)  
• Copies of any recent certifications or awards

You can forward everything to sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com. Feel free to check your Gmail and Notion workspaces if you need to locate any of these documents.

Thank you, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,

Sarah Thompson  
HR Representative  
Tech Innovations Inc.

final_output:

Thank you, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
